metadata.title: CVE-2019-14934 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in PDFResurrect before 0.18. pdf_load_pages_kids inpdf.c doesn't validate a certain size value, which leads to a mallocfailure and out-of-bounds write.

criterions.comment: pdfresurrect: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
